title: Skills
description: I'm a graduaded but mostly self-taught web and software developer

left.title: Software Developer
left.content: With two years of dedicated experience in software development, I bring a solid foundation in programming languages such as C# and Java. My expertise spans creating efficient, scalable applications with a focus on clean, maintainable code. I am constantly exploring new technologies and best practices to ensure my development approach meets modern standards.

center.title: Web Developer
center.content: I am also skilled in web development, with experience in designing and implementing responsive websites and web applications. Proficient in PHP, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I have the tools to build user-friendly and visually appealing sites that prioritize performance and accessibility.

right.title: Database Administrator
right.content: Alongside software and web development, I have hands-on experience in database administration. From structuring databases to writing optimized queries, I am proficient in MySQL and committed to ensuring data is efficiently stored, accessed, and managed. My aim is to ensure the integrity and performance of database systems through best practices and effective problem-solving.
